APP_SERVER_CONFIGURATION_INVALID: Það er vandamál með uppsetningu netþjónsins.
APP_SERVER_CHECKING_UDPATE_ERR: Vandamál kom upp við að athuga útgáfu.
APP_DOWNLOAD_ERROR_FILE: Vinnsla forritsuppfærslu mistókst. Þú getur gengið í discord netþjóninn okkar til að fá stuðning, https://discord.gg/Gq9nush6SP
GAME_SERVER_ALREADY_CONNECTING: Þú ert nú þegar að tengjast netþjóni. Vinsamlegast bíðið.
GAME_SERVER_ALREADY_CONNECTED: Þú ert nú þegar tengdur við netþjón
GAME_SERVER_PLAYER_CONNECTED: Þú ert tengdur við netþjóninn. Hleður leikjaheiminum.
GAME_ITEM_USED_ANOTHER_PLAYER: Það er verið að nota það af öðrum leikmanni.
GAME_CONNECTION_REJECTED: Tenging við netþjóninn mistókst. Vinsamlegast uppfærðu með því að endurræsa ræsiforritið.
APP_LAUNCHER_DOWNLOADING: Með því að hlaða niður ræsiforritinu
GAME_INTRO_SERVER_OWNER_WAITING: Það býst við að eigandinn byrji leikinn.
GAME_INTRO_SERVER_START_DESCRIPTION: Please press {key} to start the game.
GAME_INTRO_MULTIPLAYER_BY_BOTBENSON: Subnautica Below Zero Multiplayer Mod (by BOT Benson)
APP_NOT_OPENED_PLATFORM: Make sure the platform on which the game is installed is open. (Steam/Epic etc..)
APP_INVALID_PLATFORM: Ógildur vettvangur. Vettvangur þar sem leikurinn er uppsettur fannst ekki.
APP_DEPENDENCIES_ERROR: There was a problem downloading dependencies.
GAME_BEPINEX_DETECTED: Bepinex fannst. Fjölspilun hefur verið óvirkt. Vinsamlegast fjarlægðu öllum móðurskrám sem tengist Bepinex.
LOBBY_ALL_SERVER_BUSY: Failed to Create Server. There are no available servers.
LOBBY_NOT_NETWORK_CONNECTED: You are not connected to the Network.
API_WEB_SERVER_RETURN_NULL: There was no response from the server.
API_SERIALIZE_ERROR: There is a problem in the parsing of data.
API_CLIENT_TO_HOST_JOIN_FAILED: Connecting to the server failed. Try again.
GAME_INVITE_CODE_PLACEHOLDER: Enter an Invite Code or IP Address.
GAME_INVITE_CODE_EMPTY_ERROR: Please enter an Invite Code or IP Address.
GAME_CONNECTION_SERVER_VERSION_MISMATCH: The server version and your version do not match.
GAME_CONNECTION_FIX_ERROR:
If your friend cannot connect to your server or you cannot connect to your friend's server. There is no other solution other than these 3 steps.

1. Steam Offline Mode (Do not use Steam in offline mode)
2. Any VPN Program (AvastVPN, NordVPN, etc. / Close your VPN Program and try again)
3. Antivirus Problem (Disable your antivirus program and try it)

Important Note: Both parties need to check these steps.
